text: Hello all, my name is Krishna Aayak and welcome to my YouTube channel.
So guys, today I am going to start an amazing playlist called Natural Language Processing.
Now this is a very important playlist. We have seen machine learning, deep learning, stats, python.
Now what is natural language processing? What is its roadmap if you want to read it?
And always remember that natural language processing can be done with machine learning and deep learning.
